src:
Antes de ser famosa, Paola Jara estuvo en 'reality' de RCN presentado por Andrea Serna
Aunque muchos no la recuerden de hace 11 años, dentro de la trayectoria de la cantante popular está su participación en el programa 'Se busca intérprete'.

05 Nov 2019, 15:11

Pese a que no obtuvo el aclamado premio dentro de la producción del canal, Paola logró conquistar con su voz a los televidentes y a Galy Galiano, quien era el ‘coach’ de su equipo.
En aquella época (2008), la artista no tenía los retoques estéticos que hoy luce sin miedo, pues ella misma ha aceptado en varias oportunidades que se sometió a procedimientos como: una mamoplastia de aumento y una rinoplastia.
Luego del contundente éxito que ha tenido la cantante a nivel nacional e internacional, una grabación de su paso por el concurso se volvió tendencia en YouTube; allí ella interpretó el tema ‘Por arriba o por abajo’, de Jesús Vides.
Este es uno de los videos de su participación, que fue compartido por el autor en la plataforma:
text:
Before being famous, Paola Jara was in RCN's reality show presented by Andrea Serna
Although many do not remember 11 years ago, within the trajectory of the popular singer is her participation in the program 'Interpreter is sought'.

05 Nov 2019, 15:11

Although he did not get the acclaimed award within the production of the channel, Paola managed to conquer with his voice the viewers and Galy Galiano, who was the "coach" of his team.
At that time (2008), the artist did not have the aesthetic touch-ups that she looks today without fear, because she herself has accepted on several occasions that she underwent procedures such as: an augmentation mammoplasty and a rhinoplasty.
After the overwhelming success that the singer has had nationally and internationally, a recording of her time in the contest became a trend on YouTube; there she interpreted the theme ‘Above or below’, by Jesús Vides.
This is one of the videos of his participation, which was shared by the author on the platform:
